item.title: How to Install Tool-X in Termux
item.description: Did you realize you can transform your smartphone into a true hacking machine? All of this can be accomplished with the assistance of Termux and Tool-X. If you already have termux installed on your phone, you may install all tools with a single click. If you do not have it, you can read how here What Is Termux How to Install It and First Steps After Instalation. What exactly is Tool-X?
